1b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// dam
1b2('bum): brgya so drug pa/ ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa/
1b3('bum): de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par
2a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sem/
2a2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom/
2a3('bum): ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi
2a4('bum): ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan
2b1('bum): yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par
2b2('bum): bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis
2b3('bum): shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
2b4('bum): pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa
2b5('bum): de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi
3a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//
3a2('bum): gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas
3a3('bum): kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa
3a4('bum): de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang
3a5('bum): du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
3a6('bum): rnams so// kro'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba
3b1('bum): byas pa lta zhog gi ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i
3b2('bum): byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo do'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
3b3('bum): mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di den dang ldan/
3b4('bum): yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bya ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi/
3b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin bzung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ rmongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/
3b6('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/
3b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur
4a1('bum): pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang
4a2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
4a3('bum): ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can blan/
4a4('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
4a5('bum): la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel
4a6('bum): lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab
4a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di/
4b1('bum): skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bzung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab
4b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
4b3('bum): la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe
4b4('bum): khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes
4b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ ches de'i
4b6('bum): bsod nams mang dubabel le// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// ko'u shi ka stong gi
4b7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can
5a1('bum): ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rig
5a2('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka di
5a3('bum): bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste
5a4('bum): gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du
5a5('bum): yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/
5a6('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos
5a7('bum): rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro//
5b1('bum): gang gis tshe byed kyis shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rtogs par 'chang rgya'o nas sgo
5b2('bum): ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// koru shi ka
5b3('bum): stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi/
5b4('bum): khams kyi sems can ji skyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sa
5b5('bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kauT
5b6('bum): shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam
5b7('bum): par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rig kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhog shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis
6a1('bum): shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khrod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa
6a2('bum): de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen
6a3('bum): pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyed kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang
6a4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
6a5('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
6a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams so// ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul/
6a7('bum): babyas pa lta zhog gi/ ko ru shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis blan
6b1('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul pa byas na/ koSh+ma shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi grwa yA/ rigs mi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'dal 'am/
6b2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab
6b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /
6b4('bum): skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du snyed la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab
6b5('bum): kyi ro rol tu phyin pa la nan tan gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
6b6('bum): la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe
6b7('bum): khyod kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis shA
7a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par bya tshang
7a2('bum): rgya'o zhes bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so//
7a3('bum): ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sa ma?/
7a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gsheg pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
7a5('bum): ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par
7a6('bum): rtse ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lcogs shig/
7a7('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan
7b1('bum): tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams na
7b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyed kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom bde bas
7b3('bum): kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
7b4('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
7b5('bum): rnam kyi sbyor mi ldag pa'i sa'o// koD+D+ha shi ka'adas bu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyir mi rtog pa'i sal bkod pa lta zhig gi/ gling chen po bzhi'o 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems
7b6('bum): can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis blar mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo da'i bsod nams de'i
7b7('bum): rgyus mang du 'phel lalag gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rig kyi bu'am/ 'gren
8a1('bum): bu bo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dor dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bya ste gsal
8a2('bum): ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyed kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du
8a3('bum): yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i /
8a4('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
8a5('bum): kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyed kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su
8a6('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
8a7('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bskon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir/
8b1('bum): mi ldog pa'i sa'o// ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams bIr mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
8b2('bum): bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ kau ru shi ka de ji snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu rong 'basod nams dri
8b3('bum): rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa med ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko& shi ka de bas kyang rigs bus/ rigs kyi bu mo
8b4('bum): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas
8b5('bum): pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yod la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes
8b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
8b7('bum): la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe
9a1('bum): khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/
9a2('bum): ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o//
9a3('bum): ko'u shi ka steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rig kyi bu
9a4('bum): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod nako'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du dpal lam/ gsol ba/
9a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
9a6('bum): 'di don dang ldan // yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
9a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis
9b1('bum): shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu rtsod
9b2('bum): gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams
9b3('bum): thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i slar zhe na/ ko'u shi ka
9b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mo ldog pa'i sa'o// ko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'brang
9b5('bum): po'i sems can phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
9b6('bum): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar
9b7('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge
10a1('bum): dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste/ gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu rmo/
10a2('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ tshangs shig/ rdzogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid lags shig/ ji ltar bstan pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ldanan tun
10a3('bum): du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rig kyi bu khyod
10a4('bum): gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob
10a5('bum): bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes
10a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o// ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sem
10a7('bum): can phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
10b1('bum): la la zhig gis byur mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ koT shi ka ji snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo da'i bsod nams 'i nAs mang du 'a la lal/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan das srung /
10b2('bum): / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal paM/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yig
10b3('bum): dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bya ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
10b4('bum): tu byin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi
10b5('bum): khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes
10b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa
10b7('bum): de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha
11a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can
11a2('bum): ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
11a3('bum): 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
11a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan
11a5('bum): du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rig
11a6('bum): kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyed kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
11a7('bum): kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches
11b1('bum): bang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa / nog gi/ koT shi kaDIng
11b2('bum): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
11b3('bum): mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas
11b4('bum): ba dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lcogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i
11b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khrod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khrod shes rab kyi pha rol tu
11b6('bum): bri pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyed gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang
11b7('bum): gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bskon/
12a1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams bla na
12a2('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag
12a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de/
12a4('bum): bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyi
12a5('bum): shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes
12a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par sbyar/
12a7('bum): de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe myed kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
12b1('bum): pa'i bung chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ rigs kyi gra'as/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ng+ges nang du 'phel lo// ko shig stong ga 'jug rten gyi khams
12b2('bum): bu'i sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can dza snying
12b3('bum): ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhug par gyur tI/ de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
12b4('bum): don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rig kyi bu khyod kyis
12b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan duH
12b6('bum): shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyed gang
12b7('bum): gi tshe/ shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnam
13a1('bum): thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bskon/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i
13a2('bum): bsad nams ches mang du 'phel lo// kairba shi ka sbyo gnyis 'jug rten gyi khams 'byung ba thasems can rnams than med pa yang ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
13a3('bum): dag par zhugs par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byanganas
13a4('bum): tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / kha /
13a5('bum): de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/
13a6('bum): shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nar tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji
13a7('bum): ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rig kyi bu khyod shre rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slong bar 'gyur ro// rig kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shre rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis
13b1('bum): byam ba mkhyen pashad mchis rnamathob par 'gyur ro// gdun ma khyud kyis thams cad zin pa nyid mchos rnam thob par gyur ba da'i gyi/ khyod bu na med pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'i shA chu sa ma
13b2('bum): rdzog par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgon/ rig kyi bu'am/ rig kyi bu mo de'i bsod nas ches mang du 'phel lo// ko ru shi ka stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham kyis mra can rnam blan
13b3('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnam lta zhog gi/ ko'u shig phyogs bcu'i phyog re re zhing gang+gA'i zla rgyas snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams
13b4('bum): cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang
13b5('bum): ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang zhig/
13b6('bum): kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lpags shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes
13b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob
14a1('bum): par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa/
14a2('bum): de'i tshe/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel li//
14a3('bum): ko ru shi ka bzhin yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems
14a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de
14a5('bum): bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/ 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
14a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya che
14a7('bum): bstan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu modo'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
14b1('bum): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ koT shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las dri mi
14b2('bum): ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher
14b3('bum): de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la le zhig/ 'di skad du bdag myur du zla
14b4('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yig/
14b5('bum): dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi gra'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'jal lo// koT+Ta shika gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams spyan mod/
14b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa
14b7('bum): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi la rol tu phyin papa don dang ldan/ lage dang /
15a1('bum): ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par skye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
15a2('bum): la la zhig/ 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rig kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
15a3('bum): byin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig+sas kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i se
15a4('bum): can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na
15a5('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
15a6('bum): pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa pra/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sem
15a7('bum): dpa' chen po la la zhig/ 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig /
15b1('bum): dril shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi bra'am/ rigs kyi bu mo da'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ ko Ta shA k+Sha/
15b2('bum): stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i'o sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta zhog gi/ kau'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po
15b3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/
15b4('bum): rig kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par bya ste gsal ba dang /
15b5('bum): yang dag par bstan pa byas pa pas/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/ 'di skad du bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
15b6('bum): 'tshang rgya'o zhes sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
15b7('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo// ko ru shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta zhog/
16a1('bum): gi ko'u shi ka rdzogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA klung gi byed ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na mad pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub
16a2('bum): khru byir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 'de dag la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rgyan
16a3('bum): brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa pra/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig/ 'di skad du bdag
16a4('bum): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gi de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi
16a5('bum): go dang ldan par rgya cher bstan na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni nges pa ste/ rdzogs pa'i byang
16a6('bum): chub tu gzhol zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur bas na/ de dag la ni de tsam du chos bstan kyang mi dgos kyi/ 'di ni 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'dod la/
16a7('bum): snying rje chen pos mnar ba'i phyir ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
16b1('bum): sems dpa' chen mo blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur ba/ lnga de ltar byung chub sems dpa' sem sa pa pa rgyu par ro can pa la sadas pa na su
16b2('bum): bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar babod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstar b.rab go//
16b3('bum): dA ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu gyud pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par brtse'o// de la de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta ga shes
16b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa/ de lta ltar nang stong/
16b5('bum): pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar phyi stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar phyin nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//
16b6('bum): de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar chen po stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la gdams
16b7('bum): shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par /
17a1('bum): de lta de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par
17a2('bum): bgyi'o// de lta de ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta da ltar chos
17a3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid la gdabs shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la
17a4('bum): gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes
17a5('bum): su bstan par bgyi'o// de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la gdams
17a6('bum): rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// dbang po rnams la gdas shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// stobs rnams la gdams shing rjes su ba
17a7('bum): bgyi'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
17b1('bum): la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// bsam gtan rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// tshad med pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
17b2('bum): 'jugs pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgul gdams shing
17b3('bum): rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su
17b4('bum): bstan par bgyi'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams lags
17b5('bum): shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// byams pa chen
17b6('bum): po la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// snying rje chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/
17b7('bum): gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad kyis kyang rjes su gzung bar bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/ chos kyis
18a1('bum): bsdu ba dang / zang zing gis bsdu bas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel gyi/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag gis
18a2('bum): ni ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni yong yang de ltar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lags pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing
18a3('bum): rjes su bstan pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
18a4('bum): la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// nang stong pa
18a5('bum): nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing
18a6('bum): rjes su bstan pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan sa/
18a7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su
18b1('bum): bstan pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// rang bzhin stong panyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pago// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// 8
18b2('bum): gis tshan nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan to//
18b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bas
18b4('bum): bapo tu yang dag par spong ba rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// dbang po rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan
18b5('bum): ba'o// stobs rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gdams shing rjes su
18b6('bum): bstan pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// bsam gtan rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// tshad med pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su
18b7('bum): bstan pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad la gdamra shing rjes su bstan pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
19a1('bum): par 'jug pa dgu la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan
19a2('bum): pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su
19a3('bum): bstan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gdams
19a4('bum): shing rjes su bstan pa'o// byams pa chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// snying rje chen po la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la
19a5('bum): gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos
19a6('bum): pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang / yongs su skyob pa legs so legs so// ko'u shi ka khyod kyis de bzhin du bya'o// 'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can
19a7('bum): rnam la phan 'dog par 'dod pa des kyang / byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed par bya'o// byang chub sem dpa' rnam za
19b1('bum): bing dang chos kyis lan gdags pas/ phan gdags shing yongs su bskyang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ koT shig bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
19b2('bum): dpa' chen po de dag las 'byung ngo // gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
19b3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa
19b4('bum): dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la slob pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
19b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa
19b6('bum): nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam ga
19b7('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
20a1('bum): pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
20a2('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin
20a3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa ma yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
20a4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur na/ rang sangs rgyas dang/
20a5('bum): nyan thos rnams kyang yod par mi 'gyur te/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
20a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la'ang slob la/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa
20a7('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
20b1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang ba ma med pa stong ba nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gas tshan cad stong panyid dang //
20b2('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo banyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidi stong pa nyid dang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang
20b3('bum): dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
20b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
20b5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
20b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dal/
20b7('bum): 'ang slob pas/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
21a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// byol songs
21a2('bum): gnas rnams kyi rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyi rgyun cad par 'gyur ro// l+h+wa ma yin ci ris kyang yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro// wA'i ris gang mngon par 'a
21a3('bum): par 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs ma zhing mtha pa rnams 'dag rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zas pa'i rigs che zhing mtha pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi'isas che nang ma
21a4('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// N+Dal chen bde'i rig kyi ldan sa 'jog rten du 'byung gyur ro// sum cu sa gsum kyi ldan ma 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// man+ta mA'i ldanam pa
21a5('bum): na du byung bar 'gyur ro// dag ma bab ga tan du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ldan 'a rten du byung bar 'gyur ro// san tshu na pa na
21a6('bum): rgya na y-i sarna sa sa pa'i ma
21a7('bum): mi pa pam []
21b1('bum): 'gyur ro// kun snang dang ba'i lhurnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i ldarnams 'jig rten srung bar 'gyur ro// chung ge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dang medang kha rnarnams
21b2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dag rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du snang bar 'gyur ro/
21b3('bum): tshad med che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi gdung ba'i lha
21b4('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig
21b5('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// cung zad sa/
21b6('bum): pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung /
21b7('bum): bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten/
22a1('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid 'jig
22a2('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po
22a3('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten
22a4('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'jig
22a5('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung
22a6('bum): bar 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// /
22a7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar gyu//
22b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
22b2('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams
22b3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa san
22b4('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
22b5('bum): med pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig
22b6('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
22b7('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa
23a1('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol
23a2('bum): tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya so bdun pa/
23a3('bum): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i
23a4('bum): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ de mi dmig pa'i tshul gyis//
23a5('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / nyan thos kyi
23a6('bum): theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi smin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las blang ba'i bsod nams zla ba'i dngos pa/
23a7('bum): gang yin pa dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang
23b1('bum): gakhar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'ang yo rab ces pa'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// tso ga zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// thal zhes bya'o// marnam pa zhes bya'o// blan med pa nas
23b2('bum): bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las
23b3('bum): byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni/ bdag gdul ba dang / bdag ni bar bya ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan
23b4('bum): las bzla ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byung
23b5('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhidang /
23b6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
23b7('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa drug dag kyang / bdag gdul ba dang / bdag zhi bar bya ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can
24a1('bum): thams cad gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang
24a2('bum): thun mong du byas shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngor/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ byang chub sems
24a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa/
24a4('bum): ngag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshad med/
24a5('bum): dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
24a6('bum): grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / byang phyogs
24a7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshan med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su ma ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dpas
24b1('bum): byung shar gyi gyims mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ rgyud med/ dpag tu med pa dag ste 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bsam ldan 'das grangs medun med pa
24b2('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang /
24b3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / lho nub kyi grags mtshams 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa/
24b4('bum): dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs ma//
24b5('bum): tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
24b6('bum): khams grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang / steng gi
24b7('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu med pa dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
25a1('bum): par gyur pa de dag zugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
25a2('bum): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ma nub kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la
25a3('bum): yang dag par zhugs pa de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos
25a4('bum): po dang / slob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa dag dang / mi slob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
25a5('bum): gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / phan par bzhed
25a6('bum): pa dang / thugs rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa dang / chos bstan pa de dag la bslabs shing /
25a7('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa' 'bras buzab pa dang / lan cig byar 'ong bab 'bras bu thob pa dang / phyir mi 'ang ba'i 'bras buzab pa dang / dgra bcom pa cad zab pa dang / rang byang chu ba theb pa dang /
25b1('bum): kyang brnams dpa ltar bldamags par dang/ das pa'i sgrub yang shad pa dang / gangags de btsun sa sa byung / ngasmrasas las pas dru drung/
25b2('bum): dgal dag pa'i rtsa bgang ji snyed cig bskyed pa de thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog/ pa?/ dam pa/ rag bral// 'os pa/ blan med pa/ ga med
25b3('bum): bamad pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang // de ltar rjes su yi rang nas/ rjes su la rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams za ba'i dngas pa sems can thams cad dang blan pang du sa
25b4('bum): te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par gyur cig ces/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la
25b5('bum): yang dag par zhugs pa des de skad du smras te/ sems kyi rnam pa de lta bus yongs su bsngos na/ dmigs pa gang dang / dngos po gang dag gi/ sems de lta bu skyes par gyur pa'i dngos po de dag
25b6('bum): dang / dmigs pa de dag rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du dmigs su yod pa yin nam/ byams pas smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag
25b7('bum): ltar mtshan mar byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du/ dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dmigs su yod pa ma yin no//
26a1('bum): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gal te de ltar dngos po med pa dag dmigs pa med pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
26a2('bum): bzhugs pa de dag dang / de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi zag pa la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu
26a3('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / mi slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
26a4('bum): gcig tu bsogs bsdus te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngos na/ ji ltar mi rtag pa la rtag go zhes bya bar 'du shes byin ci
26a5('bum): log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log
26a6('bum): tu gyur pa dang / bdag med pa la bdag ces bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci
26a7('bum): log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa de ltar/ de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu ma gyur tam/ de lta yin yang thams cad dngos po ji lta ba dang / dmigs pa ji lta
26b1('bum): bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/ sems kyang de bzhin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson dgrus kyi nam
26b2('bum): tu ldan pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang
26b3('bum): bzhin/ mig dang / rna ba dang / skra dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang de bzhin// gzugs dang / swa dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang de bzhin/ khrums dang / skye mched dang /
26b4('bum): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang de bzhin/ nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang de
26b5('bum): bzhin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa
26b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa de bzhin/ mi dmigs pa stong
26b7('bum): pa nyid kyang de bzhin// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin// dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam kyang de bzhin/ yang dag
27a1('bum): par spong ba rnams kyang de bzhin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ dbang po rnams kyang de bzhin// stobs rnams kyang de bzhin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang de bzhi/
27a2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang de bzhin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ bsam gtan rnams kyang de bzhin/ tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
27a3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang de bzhin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang de bzhin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
27a4('bum): dang / smon pa med pa'ang de bzhin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang de bzhin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang de bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang
27a5('bum): de bzhin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang de bzhin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang de bzhin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin te/ gal te de ltar dngos po ji lta ba dang /
27a6('bum): dmigs pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/ sems kyang de bzhin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu ni 'ang de bzhin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bani// /
27a7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/ nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rtsi stong pa nyid kyang de
27b1('bum): bzhin/ mi nang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ chen po stong ba nyid kyang de bzhin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin
27b2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang bzhin
27b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang
27b4('bum): bzhin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang de bzhin/ rdzu
27b5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ dbang po rnams kyang de bzhin/ stobs rnams kyang de bzhin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang de bzhin/ 'phag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
27b6('bum): de bzhin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ bsam gtan rnams kyang de bzhin/ tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang de bzhin/
27b7('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang de bzhin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang de bzhin// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sgom pa med pa'ang /
28a1('bum): de bzhin/ mngon par shes pa rnams sang dra bzhin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang de bzhin/ gzungs kyi sku rnams kyang de bzhin/ badzin shegs pa'i skams
28a2('bum): bcu' bzhin/ ma 'jigs pa pani 'du bzhin/ sus yang dag par rig pa bcu'ang bzhin/ spangs rgyas byangs su 'dus pan rgyad kyang de bzhin mi ni/ blan med pa 'a da
28a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dngos po de ni gang zhig yin/ dmigs pa de ni gang zhig yin/ byang chub de ni gang zhig yin/ sems de ni gang zhig yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
28a4('bum): de dag ni gang zhig yin/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de ni gang zhig yin// byams pas smras pa/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin
28a5('bum): pa drug la spyod spyod pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur cing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su zin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa'i
28a6('bum): chos thams cad la bsgrubs pa dag ni/ dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i
28a7('bum): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos por dag mtshan mar byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su ma sde'i// de dag ni 'di ji ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ gnyis kyi tshul gyis/
28b1('bum): sa// sa ma sa nu lanas sna mnan// mnanam ma rgyal rnasam na// ma la/ /
28b2('bum): rgyal mas ma yin na// chen mongs de'i rdul gyis ma yin no// rnam par byung ba'i tshul rgyas ma yin no// sgru ba'i tshul mos su yin no// bgag pa'i tshul gyis ma yin ni// la NA byu /
28b3('bum): dpa' de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa'ang ma yin no// sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa'ang ma yin no// dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa'ang ma yin no// dge ban pa nas
28b4('bum): gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'ang ma yin// rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs par gyur pa'ang ma yin na/ de dag ni dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
28b5('bum): bdas de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar mi 'gyur te/
28b6('bum): btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'a'i mdun du mi bshad do// bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bsnun pa na
28b7('bum): theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sem pa'i mdun du mi bshad do//
29a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni
29a2('bum): theg pa la gsar du zhug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du bshad do//
29a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du bshad do// phyi stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi
29a4('bum): bshad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub
29a5('bum): sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// chen po stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// don dam pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa
29a6('bum): la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du maM bshad do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// 'dus ma
29a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// mtha' las 'das pa stong panyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang
29b1('bum): chub sems dpa' mdun du mi bshad do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// dor ba med pa stong pa
29b2('bum): nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpazhi
29b3('bum): mdun du mi bshad do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg
29b4('bum): pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mdun du mi ba sha/
29b5('bum): do/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs
29b6('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// dran pa nye bar
29b7('bum): gzhag pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// yang dag par spong ba rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byad
30a1('bum): chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// dbang po
30a2('bum): rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// stobs rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun
30a3('bum): du mi bshad do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams de ltar bstan pa ni shang la 'du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa
30a4('bum): la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//
30a5('bum): bsam gtan rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gser du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// tshad med pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub
30a6('bum): sems pa'i mdun du mi bshad do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// rnam par thar
30a7('bum): pa brgyad de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs
